茶几.definition: small side table; coffee table; teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)

茶垢.definition: tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)

茶座.definition: teahouse; tea-stall with seats; tea-garden or teahouse seat

茶敘.definition: to take tea and chat; a small-scale informal gathering with tea and snacks

茶杯.definition: teacup; tea-glass; cup; mug; CL:隻|只[zhi1]

茶水.definition: tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves

茶碗蒸.definition: chawanmushi, Japanese savory egg custard dish that is steamed and served in a small bowl

茶經.definition: the Classic of Tea, first monograph ever on tea and its culture, written by 陸羽|陆羽[Lu4 Yu3] between 760-780

茶胸斑啄木鳥.pinyin: cha2 xiong1 ban1 zhuo2 mu4 niao3
茶胸斑啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) fulvous-breasted woodpecker (Dendrocopos macei)

茶葉.definition: tea; tea leaves; CL:盒[he2],罐[guan4],包[bao1],片[pian4]

茶葉蛋.definition: tea egg (egg boiled with flavorings which may include black tea)

茶鏽.definition: tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)

茶陵.definition: Chaling County in Zhuzhou 株洲[Zhu1 zhou1], Hunan

茶陵縣.definition: Chaling County in Zhuzhou 株洲[Zhu1 zhou1], Hunan

茶飯不思.definition: no thought for tea or rice (idiom); melancholic and suffering; to have no appetite

茶飯無心.definition: no heart for tea or rice (idiom); melancholic and suffering; to have no appetite

茶餘酒後.definition: see 茶餘飯後|茶余饭后[cha2 yu2 fan4 hou4]

茶餘飯後.definition: leisure time (over a cup of tea, after a meal etc)

茶餘飯飽.definition: see 茶餘飯後|茶余饭后[cha2 yu2 fan4 hou4]

茶馬互市.definition: old tea-horse market between Tibet, China, Southeast Asia and India, formalized as a state enterprise under the Song dynasty

茶馬古道.definition: old tea-horse road or southern Silk Road, dating back to 6th century, from Tibet and Sichuan through Yunnan and Southeast Asia, reaching to Bhutan, Sikkim, India and beyond

茶點.definition: tea and cake; refreshments; tea and dim sum
